items.headline: ‘My mom was very upset’: My stepsister changed the address on our mother’s bank account. Can she be trusted as executor?

items.headline: Actor Justin Baldoni lists $8.9 million Ojai estate as legal battle with Blake Lively continues
items.summary_en: Beleaguered actor Justin Baldoni has quietly listed his sprawling California compound for $8.88 million, months before he is due to go head to head in a legal battle against his former costar Blake Lively.

items.headline: Why silver prices cratered on a reported Russian proposal to re-dollarize
items.summary_en: Bloomberg reported an unconfirmed package of proposals from Russia offering the U.S. economic partnership in energy and natural resources projects, and a commitment towards the dollar system

items.headline: Pinterest shares are sinking. The AI risk is now, one analyst says.

items.headline: This trucking company is AI’s latest casualty, as its stock suffers worst day in more than 6 years
items.summary_en: Shares of C.H. Robinson Worldwide on Thursday headed for their steepest drop ever, as investors seemed to focus their fears about AI disruption onto the transportation and logistics company.

items.headline: Applied Materials’ stock jumps after earnings. The CEO just made a bold prediction for the chip sector.

items.headline: Energy is the best-performing sector in the S&P 500 so far this year — and it’s not just because of the rise in oil prices
items.summary_en: The energy sector has been the best-performing sector in the S&P 500 this year — and it’s not just because risks to global oil flows, tied to Venezuela and Iran, have boosted crude prices by nearly 10%.
